extendedInfo.description: Are you ready to take out all your stress?Are you ready to cut all your cigarettes and stop smoking for ever!Use your finger to cut the cigarettes, you will feel like a real samuraiThe more you slice the cigar, the better! Depending on the proportion you can cut it into up to eight pieces! THREE different stages! - Easy - Medium - HardBe careful of the traps; you cannot slice the lighters or any other accessory! Be careful you don't let cigarettes drop without being sliced!... Extremely addictive!This game is extremely popular in other gaming platforms.Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. We may also send you some notification that you can always elect not to see them again. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!

reviews.title: Under appreciated by all!
reviews.comment: This app is the best thing for a craving! I have a quit tracker that I keep track of my progress with, but this is the app REALLY getting me through this! Five stars for sure!
reviews.author: Carlyn Danos
